org.jerkar.api.utils

Class JkUtilsReflect

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jerkar.api.utils.JkUtilsReflect

  • public final class JkUtilsReflect
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for dealing with reflection

      • methodWithSameNameAndArgType

        public static java.lang.reflect.Method methodWithSameNameAndArgType(java.lang.reflect.Method original,
                                                                    java.lang.Class<?> targetClass)
        Returns a method from the target class that has the same name and same argument types then the specified one. Argument types are compared on name base to handle different classloaders.

      • getInheritedAnnotation

        public static <T extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation> T getInheritedAnnotation(java.lang.reflect.Method method,
                                                                                   java.lang.Class<T> annotationClass)
        Returns the annotation declared on a given method. If no annotation is declared on the method, then annotation is searched in parent classes.

      • getInheritedAnnotation

                                                                                   java.lang.Class<T> annotationClass,
                                                                                   java.lang.String methodName,
                                                                                   java.lang.Class<?>... argTypes)
        Returns the annotation declared on a given method. If no annotation is declared on the method, then annotation is searched in parent classes.

      • invokeStaticMethod

        public static <T> T invokeStaticMethod(java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                                       java.lang.String methodName,
                                       java.lang.Object... args)
        Invokes a static method with the specified arguments
        Parameters:
        clazz - The class the method is invoked on.
        methodName - The method name to invoke
        args - The argument values the method is invoked with.

      • invokeInstanceMethod

        public static <T> T invokeInstanceMethod(java.lang.Object instance,
                                         java.lang.String methodName,
                                         java.lang.Object... args)
        Invokes an instance method with the specified arguments
        Parameters:
        instance - The instance the method is invoked on.
        methodName - The method name to invoke
        args - The argument values the method is invoked with.
